trends: There has been one other sighting in Noxapater
There were no other sightings in Noxapater on or around December 21st 2012
Summary: Was called outside by father and friend to see a object slowly moving across sky.
divs: sighting detailsheard a load boom which my father and mother investigated. a few minutes later i was called outside by my father and friend to witness a lowflying object that was ice-cream coneish in shape and glowing\flashing a spectrum of red and yellow like colors. i shouted to everyone "iphones!" as i wanted to capture it on some kind of video. however by the time i could run in the house and return it was gone. simply gone.
